tweet: Forced arbitration clauses restrict Americans access to justice by stripping consumers + workers of their right to go to court. Instead, they are forced into an unfair system where everything can be done in secret making it hard for them to prove their case. #EndForcedArbitration

Today, Chairman @RepJerryNadler @RepHankJohnson @RepCicilline @SenBlumenthal held a press conference to announce the introduction of a package of bills to end the use of forced arbitration in consumer, antitrust, employment, and civil rights disputes. #EndForcedArbitration pic.twitter.com/E0NVnIz1Vq
